title: hard-coded path to gatk in remapping.py
body:
I tried running the caller and ran into an error because the path to gatk was hard-coded instead of linking to my path to gatk from the parameter.txt file. 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/89814292/191328245-aeb0906b-066e-4f02-8fa3-d9f75bf890ae.png)
